Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Pulaski, 69th, Kedzie, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Pulaski, 69th, Kedzie, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
